governance.chain: L0 Human → L1 LDS Kernel V1 → L2 Proposer

files: SAINT_WHITE_LABEL.lds.json — Branding engine with 5 overridable categories (identity, colors, typography, domain, email), 6 brand management operations, multi-tenant domain-based routing, 4 preset themes, non-overridable safeguards (kernel, invariants, audit, permissions, data isolation).

SAINT_SSO.lds.json — Enterprise SSO with SAML 2.0 (primary) and OIDC (secondary), IDP group-to-role mapping, JIT user provisioning with attribute sync, session management (8hr duration, 30min idle timeout, force reauth), single logout, multi-tenant SSO per domain, soft deactivation on group removal.

SAINT_API.lds.json — External API layer with 8 API resources covering all Phase 2-4 entities, role-scoped API keys (live/test), 3-tier rate limiting (60/300/1000 rpm), 12 webhook event types with HMAC signing, usage metering dashboard, cursor-based pagination, interactive API docs.
key_features_delivered: White-label: 5 overridable categories, 6 management operations, domain-based routing
White-label: 4 preset themes (ValidKernel Dark, Saint-Gobain Blue, GCP Green, Light Professional)
White-label: Live preview with side-by-side comparison before activation
White-label: Non-overridable safeguards — kernel, invariants, audit, permissions cannot be changed
SSO: SAML 2.0 with RSA-SHA256 signing, 7 attribute mappings
SSO: OIDC with PKCE, 4 claim mappings
SSO: IDP group-to-SAINT-role mapping with conflict resolution
SSO: JIT provisioning with attribute sync on each login
SSO: Soft deactivation — removed from IDP groups = deactivated in SAINT
SSO: Session management — 8hr duration, 30min idle, force reauth for sensitive actions
SSO: Multi-tenant SSO — each domain can have its own IDP
API: 8 resource groups exposing all Phase 2-4 entity operations
API: Role-scoped API keys (live and test types)
API: 3-tier rate limiting with standard rate limit headers
API: 12 webhook events with HMAC-SHA256 signature verification
API: Cursor-based pagination, filtering, sorting conventions
API: Usage metering per key with 30-day rolling dashboard
API: Key rotation with grace period for zero-downtime migration
All 3 entities admin-only (gcp_admin) — enterprise configuration
Every API request passes through kernel validation — API is a boundary, not a bypass

gcp_admin.SAINT_WHITE_LABEL: Full access — create, edit, preview, activate brands
gcp_admin.SAINT_SSO: Full access — configure SSO, manage group mapping, view users
gcp_admin.SAINT_API: Full access — manage keys, webhooks, view usage

checklist.item: All entities declare phase: 5 with correct sequence numbers
All entities have react_component block with exports
All entities have demo_data for demo mode
All entities have backend API endpoints defined
White-label non-overridable elements enforce kernel safety
SSO extends auth system as third mode
API kernel validation documented for every request

next_phase_instructions.name: OPERATIONS
entities_to_build: SAINT_ADMIN.lds.json — Admin console for platform management. User management, system settings, audit log viewer, platform health monitoring.
SAINT_BILLING.lds.json — Subscription management and billing. Stripe integration, usage-based metering, invoice generation, plan management.
SAINT_INTEGRATIONS.lds.json — Third-party integration management. Pre-built connectors (Salesforce, Procore, PlanGrid, Bluebeam), custom integration builder, integration health monitoring.
next_phase_instructions.dependencies: All Phase 1-5 entities. Admin manages users and system. Billing ties to pricing model. Integrations extend API capabilities.
next_phase_instructions.command_for_next_chat: Continue building PROJECT SAINT Phase 6. Reference SAINT_MASTER_INDEX.lds.json and all Phase 1-5 entities. Build the OPERATIONS tier: Admin, Billing, and Integrations. Each as a self-contained .lds.json entity file. THIS IS THE FINAL PHASE.
